TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HtmlTable extends System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl

summary.span: 允許以程式設計方式存取伺服器上的 HTML 項目。

span.span: Allows programmatic access on the server to the HTML element.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用控制來以程式設計方式控制 HTML``在伺服器上的項目。Use the control to programmatically control the HTML `
` element on the server.這可讓您在網頁上建立資料表。This allows you to create a table on a Web page.您可以動態變更的外觀`
`藉由設定項目， ， ， ，和屬性。You can dynamically change the appearance of the `
` element by setting the , , , , and properties. 您也可以控制如何藉由設定顯示儲存格內容， ，和屬性。You can also control how the content of a cell is displayed by setting the , , and properties. 資料列控制會儲存在控制項的屬性。The rows of the control are stored in the property of the control. 這可讓您以程式設計方式存取個別的資料列的資料表。This allows you to programmatically access the individual rows of the table. > [!NOTE] > 不支援複雜的表格模式。A complex table model is not supported. 您不能有控制與巢狀``， ``， ``， ``，或``項目。You cannot have an control with nested ``, ``, ``, ``, or `` elements.這些項目移除而不發出警告，並不會出現在輸出的 HTML。These elements are removed without warning and do not appear in the output HTML.如果您嘗試以程式設計方式加入至這些資料表模型項目，則擲回例外狀況集合控制項。An exception will be thrown if you attempt to programmatically add these table model elements to the collection of the control.如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用控制項來顯示資料表中的資訊。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control to display information in a table. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableAppearance/CS/htmltablebgcolorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableAppearance/VB/htmltablebgcolorvb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何以動態方式建立控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to dynamically create an control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTable#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTable/CS/htmltablecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTable#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTable/VB/htmltablevb.aspx#1)]
`， ``, `

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式建立並初始化的新執行個體類別。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of . |屬性Property|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||「 資料表 」 的常值字串。The "table" literal string.| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式建立的新執行個體控制，並將它放在網頁上。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically create a new instance of an control and place it on the Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableCtor/CS/htmltablectorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableCtor/VB/htmltablectorvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Align { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 控制項相對於 Web 網頁上其他項目的對齊方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the alignment of the control in relation to other elements on the Web page.

value.span: 和 Web 網頁上其他項目相關的 控制項之對齊方式。

span.span: The alignment of the control in relation to other elements on the Web page.

value.span: 預設值為 ，表示這個屬性未設定。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以指定的對齊方式相對於其他項目在網頁上的控制項。Use the property to specify the alignment of the control in relation to other elements on the Web page. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性不會控制的儲存格內容的對齊方式控制項。This property does not control the alignment of the contents in the cells of the control. 若要控制個別儲存格內容的對齊方式，使用和屬性類別。To control the alignment of contents of an individual cell, use the and properties of the class. 您也可以使用來控制內容的整個資料列中的資料格的對齊方式和屬性類別。You can also control the alignment of contents of the cells in an entire row by using the and properties of the class. 下表列出可以使用這個屬性的值。The following table lists the values that can be used for this property. |值Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`Left`|對齊的左邊緣的網頁上的控制項。Aligns the control on the left edge of the Web page.| |`Center`|對齊中間網頁上的控制項。Aligns the control in the middle of the Web page.| |`Right`|對齊網頁的右邊緣的控制項。Aligns the control on the right edge of the Web page.| > [!NOTE] > 如果您指定`Left`或`Right`對齊方式，在網頁上的其他項目會自動換行的左右分別控制。If you specify `Left` or `Right` alignment, other elements on the Web page will wrap to the right or left of the control, respectively. 如果您指定`Center`對齊方式就會發生任何換行及其他項目會出現在控制項下方。If you specify `Center` alignment, no wrapping occurs and other elements appear below the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以指定的對齊方式相對於其他項目在網頁上的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the alignment of the control in relation to other elements on the Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableLayout#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableLayout/CS/htmltablealigncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableLayout#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableLayout/VB/htmltablealignvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ BgColor { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 控制項的背景色彩。

span.span: Gets or sets the background color of the control.
The background color of the control.

value.span: 預設值為 ，表示這個屬性未設定。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以指定的背景色彩控制項。Use the property to specify the background color of the control. 您可以依名稱或使用前面加上井字號字元的十六進位值，指定的色彩 （#），#RRGGBB 形式。You can specify a color either by name or by using a hexadecimal value, preceded by the pound character (#), in the form #RRGGBB. RR、 GG 和 BB 表示十六進位值從 0 到 255 的色彩，紅色、 綠色和藍色元件分別表示。RR, GG, and BB represent hexadecimal values from 0 to 255 that indicate the red, green, and blue components of a color, respectively. 例如，值 # 0000ff> 代表藍色的色彩。For example, the value #0000FF represents the color blue. 它的最小值 (00) 給紅色和綠色的元件，而指定的藍色元件為指定的最大值 (FF)。It specifies the minimum value (00) for the red and green components, while specifying the maximum value (FF) for the blue component. 下表顯示十六個預先定義的 HTML 色彩名稱和對應的十六進位值，可用於屬性。The following table shows the sixteen predefined HTML color names and corresponding hexadecimal values that can be used for the property. 如需有關 HTML 色彩的詳細資訊，請參閱[World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 網站](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information on HTML colors, see the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). |色彩的名稱Color name|十六進位值Hexadecimal value| |----------------|-----------------------| |青色Aqua|#00FFFF#00FFFF| |黑色Black|#000000#000000| |藍色Blue|#0000FF#0000FF| |粉紅色Fuchsia|#FF00FF#FF00FF| |灰色Gray|#808080#808080| |綠色Green|#008000#008000| |淺綠色Lime|#00FF00#00FF00| |暗紅色Maroon|#800000#800000| |海軍Navy|#000080#000080| |深黃色Olive|#808000#808000| |紫色Purple|#800080#800080| |紅色Red|#FF0000#FF0000| |銀級Silver|#C0C0C0#C0C0C0| |藍綠色Teal|#008080#008080| |白色White|#FFFFFF#FFFFFF| |黃色Yellow|#FFFF00#FFFF00| 搭配使用可用的色彩屬性可由列舉型別。The available colors for use with the property can be determined from the enumeration. 色彩名稱不區分大小寫。Color names are case-insensitive. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性以程式設計方式控制的背景色彩控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically control the background color of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableAppearance/CS/htmltablebgcolorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableAppearance/VB/htmltablebgcolorvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Border { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 控制項的框線寬度 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: Gets or sets the width (in pixels) of the border of the control.

value.span: 控制項的框線寬度 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: The width (in pixels) of the border of an control.

value.span: 預設值是 -1，表示未設定框線寬度。

span.span: The default is -1, which indicates that the border width is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定框線的寬度。Use the property to specify the width of the border. 如果您不想顯示的框線控制項，將此屬性設定為 0 （沒有框線寬度） 則為-1 （未設定框線寬度）。If you do not want to display a border for the control, set this property to either 0 (no border width) or -1 (border width is not set). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性以程式設計方式控制的框線寬度控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically control the border width of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableAppearance/CS/htmltablebgcolorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableAppearance/VB/htmltablebgcolorvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ BorderColor { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 控制項的框線色彩。

span.span: Gets or sets the border color of the control.
The border color of the control.

value.span: 預設值為 ，表示這個屬性未設定。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以指定的框線色彩控制項。Use the property to specify the border color of the control. 您可以依名稱或使用前面加上井字號字元的十六進位值，指定的色彩 （#），#RRGGBB 形式。You can specify a color either by name or by using a hexadecimal value, preceded by the pound character (#), in the form #RRGGBB. RR、 GG 和 BB 表示十六進位值從 0 到 255 的色彩，紅色、 綠色和藍色元件分別表示。RR, GG, and BB represent hexadecimal values from 0 to 255 that indicate the red, green, and blue components of a color, respectively. 例如，值 # 0000ff> 代表藍色的色彩。For example, the value #0000FF represents the color blue. 它的最小值 (00) 給紅色和綠色的元件，而指定的藍色元件為指定的最大值 (FF)。It specifies the minimum value (00) for the red and green components, while specifying the maximum value (FF) for the blue component. 下表顯示十六個預先定義的 HTML 色彩名稱和對應的十六進位值，可用於屬性。The following table shows the sixteen predefined HTML color names and corresponding hexadecimal values that can be used for the property. 如需有關 HTML 色彩的詳細資訊，請參閱[World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 網站](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information on HTML colors, see the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). |色彩的名稱Color name|十六進位值Hexadecimal value| |----------------|-----------------------| |青色Aqua|#00FFFF#00FFFF| |黑色Black|#000000#000000| |藍色Blue|#0000FF#0000FF| |粉紅色Fuchsia|#FF00FF#FF00FF| |灰色Gray|#808080#808080| |綠色Green|#008000#008000| |淺綠色Lime|#00FF00#00FF00| |暗紅色Maroon|#800000#800000| |海軍Navy|#000080#000080| |深黃色Olive|#808000#808000| |紫色Purple|#800080#800080| |紅色Red|#FF0000#FF0000| |銀級Silver|#C0C0C0#C0C0C0| |藍綠色Teal|#008080#008080| |白色White|#FFFFFF#FFFFFF| |黃色Yellow|#FFFF00#FFFF00| 搭配使用可用的色彩屬性可由列舉型別。The available colors for use with the property can be determined from the enumeration. 色彩名稱不區分大小寫。Color names are case-insensitive. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性以程式設計方式控制的框線色彩控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically control the border color of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableAppearance/CS/htmltablebgcolorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableAppearance/VB/htmltablebgcolorvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int CellPadding { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 控制項中儲存格內容與其框線之間的間距 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of space (in pixels) between the contents of a cell and the cell's border in the control.

value.span: 控制項中儲存格內容與其框線之間的間距 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: The amount of space (in pixels) between the contents of a cell and the cell's border in the control.

value.span: 預設值為 -1，表示這個屬性未設定。

span.span: The default value is -1, which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可控制的儲存格的內容與儲存格的框線之間的間距。Use the property to control the spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border. 指定的填補量會加入至儲存格的四個邊。The padding amount specified is added to all four sides of the cell. 資料行中的所有資料格會共用同一個儲存格的寬度。因此，間距會套用到資料行中最寬的資料格。All cells in a column share the same cell width; therefore, the spacing is applied to the widest cell in the column. 同樣地，相同的資料列中的所有資料格會共用相同的儲存格高度。Similarly, all cells in the same row share the same cell height. 間距被套用至資料列中最高的儲存格。The spacing is applied to the tallest cell in the row. 個別儲存格大小不能指定。Individual cell sizes cannot be specified. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性以程式設計方式控制的儲存格的內容與中的儲存格的框線之間的間距控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically control the spacing between the contents of the cell and the cell's border in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableLayout#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableLayout/CS/htmltablealigncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableLayout#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableLayout/VB/htmltablealignvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int CellSpacing { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 控制項中相鄰儲存格之間的間距 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of space (in pixels) between adjacent cells in the control.

value.span: 控制項中相鄰儲存格之間的間距 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: The amount of space (in pixels) between adjacent cells in the control.

value.span: 預設值為 -1，表示這個屬性未設定。

span.span: The default value is -1, which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可控制中的個別儲存格之間的間距控制項。Use the property to control the spacing between individual cells in the control. 垂直和水平，則會套用這個間距。This spacing is applied both vertically and horizontally. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性以程式設計方式控制的儲存格間距控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically control the spacing of cells in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableLayout#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableLayout/CS/htmltablealigncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableLayout#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableLayout/VB/htmltablealignvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance class System.Web.UI.ControlCollection CreateControlCollection() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function CreateControlCollection () As ControlCollection

summary.span: 為 控制項建立新的 物件。

span.span: Creates a new object for the control.

returns.span: ，包含 控制項的子伺服器控制項。

span.span: A that contains the control's child server controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會建立物件，用來保存資料表資料列。The method creates a object that is used to hold table rows. 方法主要是對控制項開發人員有利，可用以擴充 控制項的功能。The method is primarily of interest to control developers extending the functionality of the control.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Height { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 控制項的高度。

span.span: Gets or sets the height of the control.
The height of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可控制的高度控制項。Use the property to control the height of the control. 像素為單位，通常被指定高度。The height is normally specified in pixels. 不過，您也可以指定瀏覽器視窗高度的百分比在值後面附加百分比符號 （%）。However, you can also specify a percentage of the browser window height by appending a percent sign (%) to the value. 例如，值`100%`表示資料表的全部高度瀏覽器視窗的高度。For example, the value `100%` indicates a height for the table that is the full height of the browser window. 資料表會自動展開，且合約會隨著使用者變更視窗大小。The table automatically expands and contracts as the user changes the window size. > [!NOTE] > 如果您指定的值小於顯示所需的內容控制項，這個屬性會被忽略。If you specify a value that is smaller than is required to display the contents of the control, this property is ignored. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性以程式設計方式控制的高度控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically control the height of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableAppearance/CS/htmltablebgcolorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableAppearance/VB/htmltablebgcolorvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定控制項的開頭和結尾標記之間的內容，而不須自動將特殊字元轉換為對等的 HTML 實體 (Entity)。

span.span: Gets or sets the content between the opening and closing tags of the control, without automatically converting special characters to their equivalent HTML entities.

summary.span: 這個控制項不支援這個屬性。

span.span: The content between the opening and closing tags of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!CAUTION] > 請勿從讀取或將值指派給這個屬性。Do not read from or assign a value to this property. 否則會擲回 例外狀況。Otherwise, a exception is thrown. 這個屬性繼承自類別，並不適用於類別。This property is inherited from the class and is not applicable to the class.

exception.span: 嘗試從這個屬性讀取值，或指派值給這個屬性。

span.span: An attempt was made to read from or assign a value to this property.

span.span: Gets or sets the content between the opening and closing tags of the control, with automatic conversion of special characters to their equivalent HTML entities.

summary.span: 這個控制項不支援這個屬性。

span.span: This property is not supported for this control.

span.span: The content between the opening and closing tags of the control.

span.span: The that receives the rendered content.

summary.span: 將 控制項的子控制項呈現為指定的 物件。

span.span: Renders the control's child controls to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供額外的格式之前和之後呼叫基底類別的方法。The method provides additional formatting before and after calling the base class's method. 其他格式會呈現的 HTML控制項容易讀取的插入傳回的列，並縮排呈現之前控制項的子控制項。The additional formatting makes the rendered HTML of the control easier to read by inserting a line return and indenting before rendering the control's child controls. 主要由控制項開發人員擴充功能的使用方法控制項。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法中自訂的伺服器控制項，以便新的資料表資料列附加至控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that a new table row is appended to the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomHtmlTableRenderChildren#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTableRenderChildren/CS/custom_htmltable_renderchildrencs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomHtmlTableRenderChildren#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTableRenderChildren/VB/custom_htmltable_renderchildrenvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomHtmlTableRenderChildren#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTableRenderChildren/CS/custom_htmltable_renderchildren.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomHtmlTableRenderChildren#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTableRenderChildren/VB/custom_htmltable_renderchildren.vb#2)]

Protected Overrides Sub RenderEndTag (writer As HtmlTextWriter)

span.span: The that receives the rendered content.

summary.span: 轉譯 控制項的結束標記。

span.span: Renders the control's end tag.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 方法提供額外的格式，在呼叫基底類別方法。The method provides additional formatting after calling the base class's method. 其他格式會呈現的 HTML控制項容易讀取的插入傳回結束後``標記。The additional formatting makes the rendered HTML of the control easier to read by inserting a line return after the closing `
` tag.主要由控制項開發人員擴充功能的使用方法控制項。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法，使其永遠結束標記和新行中寫入自訂伺服器控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method so that it always writes an end tag and a new line in a custom server control. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomHtmlTableRenderEndTag#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTableRenderEndTag/CS/custom_htmltable_renderendtagcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomHtmlTableRenderEndTag#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTableRenderEndTag/VB/custom_htmltable_renderendtagvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomHtmlTableRenderEndTag#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTableRenderEndTag/CS/custom_htmltable_renderendtag.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomHtmlTableRenderEndTag#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTableRenderEndTag/VB/custom_htmltable_renderendtag.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property Rows As HtmlTableRowCollection

summary.span: 取得 集合，其中包含 控制項中的所有列。

span.span: Gets an collection that contains all the rows in the control.

value.span: ，包含 控制項中所有的資料列。

span.span: An that contains all the rows in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用集合以程式設計方式存取中的資料列控制項。Use the collection to programmatically access the rows in the control. 您可以程式設計方式加入的資料列，從，移除資料列或資料列插入至集合。You can programmatically add rows to, remove rows from, or insert rows into the collection. > [!NOTE] > 如果有任何``列出項目控制，空物件傳回。If there are no `` elements listed in the control, an empty object is returned. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用要以程式設計方式加入的資料列集合控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the collection to programmatically add a row to the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTable#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTable/CS/htmltablecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTable#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTable/VB/htmltablevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Width { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 控制項的寬度。

span.span: Gets or sets the width of the control.
The width of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可控制的寬度控制項。Use the property to control the width of the control. 像素為單位，通常被指定寬度。The width is normally specified in pixels. 不過，您也可以指定瀏覽器視窗寬度的百分比在值後面附加百分比符號 （%）。However, you can also specify a percentage of the browser window width by appending a percent sign (%) to the value. 例如，值`100%`表示寬度是瀏覽器視窗的寬度，完整的資料表。For example, the value `100%` indicates a width for the table that is the full width of the browser window. 資料表會自動展開，且合約會隨著使用者變更視窗大小。The table automatically expands and contracts as the user changes the window size. > [!NOTE] > 如果您指定的值小於顯示所需的內容控制項，這個屬性會被忽略。If you specify a value that is smaller than is required to display the contents of the control, this property is ignored. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性以程式設計方式控制的寬度控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically control the width of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableAppearance/CS/htmltablebgcolorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableAppearance/VB/htmltablebgcolorvb.aspx#1)]
